original_title: The Myrna Diones Story (Lord, Have Mercy!)
overview: Based on the real life story of Myrna Diones, a 14 year-old survivor of a brutal massacre of her, her sister and their two cousins in the Cordillera mountain range in northern Luzon by the very people who should've protect them, policemen .
title: The Myrna Diones Story (Lord, Have Mercy!)
